name: Three Star Driver Demo
description:
Three Star Driver is a fast driving game! No Brakes! No Gas!! Just Steering! Three Star Driver Demo is a look at the First Race on Both Normal and Hard Modes! In Normal Mode, All four lanes of traffic move the same direction, like a large freeway!

On Hard mode however, Two lane are with traffic, two lanes are On coming traffic!

If you like this Demo! You can Purchase The Full game for Only $1.00 ! 

Thanks for the Support!

Masked Ninja Games
